Text.Page:
We've got to get you trained up, !

Oh, I know you think you've been training for a while now, but however good you think you are, you have to be better to be part of the Free Traders Collective.

You'll need to kill a {@linkcreature:124#102#Trained Single-eyed Monster}, a {@linkcreature:125#103#Trained Dragon Hatchling}, or a {@linkcreature:126#104#Trained Vulcan}. You'll get a heart token when you do.

Once you've finished, bring your token back.
Good job. I can already tell you're going to be an asset to the collective.
